br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model

Class BattlePlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.model.BattlePlatform

  • public class BattlePlatform
extends java.lang.Object
    A BattlePlatform object storages all the information regarding a battle: the players' decks, the map and the cards placed on it, the rules being applied etc.

      • cardOnEnemyHand

        public boolean cardOnEnemyHand(Card card)
        Verifies if there is any card on enemy hand
        Parameters:
        card - Card object used to compare to enemyHandCards
        Returns:
        boolean true: There is a card on enemy hand false: there is no card on enemy hand
